GLD: Apologies for the long wait. We ask for your patience in allowing us 5-10 business days to process your return/exchange request from the day it is received back at our facility. Once your return is received and passes inspection, you will receive an email notifying you of the approval or rejection of your exchange. Please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.

conversation.message_text: Steinhafels: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Steinhafels.
Steinhafels: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Steinhafels: Welcome, I'm Quinn from Steinhafels! You are entered for a chance to win a $1,000 Shopping Spree from Steinhafels: https://steinhafels.attn.tv/aPFvKeOT3MGQ 

Have questions while you're shopping? Reply here anytime & I'll be happy to help!
We like this one
https://www.steinhafels.com/product/group/living-room/sofas-sectionals/reclining-sofas-loveseats/moonrise-reclining-sofa-in-fawn/2401037/2385389
And the matching loveseat
Are there any deals that we could get the price down?

Steinhafels: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. This is the best SMS deal we have at the moment. I hope this helps you decide to go for it, and definitely keep an eye out for upcoming offers! If it helps, we do offer financing for all purchases! You can find more information at the following link: https://steinhafels.attn.tv/aM595LIkpykO
Ok. Is this set pretty comfortable? Available at the Appleton location to check out?
Steinhafels: Yes, it is very comfortable. There is only an alternate version available to view at the Appleton location.

Template used: "Customer support"; last updated: 2022-03-21 22:15:50.868
Template used: "Tracking Info - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:47:28.277
Template used: "Shipping time"; last updated: 2023-01-20 21:53:58.073

DORADO: Sure. Upon checking, it hasn't been shipped yet. I'm sorry about that! Our processing time takes 24 hours and production can take up to 2 weeks. We usually ship via USPS or FedEx, and once shipped, it will take up to 7 business days for domestic orders, and up to 14 business days for international orders. You'll get a tracking email as soon as your order ships. If you don't see it in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders, sometimes our emails end up there as well. 

For further assistance, the best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@doradofashion.com. Our team is happy to help!

MaxAroma: Thank you for reaching out! I'm really sorry, but I can't guarantee exact delivery dates, only an estimate in business days. This is just in case the carrier runs into any unexpected delays along the way. I appreciate your understanding! Just to be sure, have you received any tracking information in your email? Please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there. 

Our standard processing time for in-stock items is 1-2 business days. We usually ship via USPS, FedEx and UPS, and once shipped, it will take 5-8 business days domestically and 7-12 business days internationally.

You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://maxaroma.attn.tv/a0nnFM8mAtfz
